query:
ALTER TABLE challenges 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS budget DECIMAL(15,2) NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS criteria JSON NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS reward VARCHAR(500) NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS deadline TIMESTAMP NULL;

mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3ENKKjNgJaxqLcS.fa3a405d8687 --database fqijacsWw6AUmwQQsRR8Z9 --execute ALTER TABLE challenges 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS budget DECIMAL(15,2) NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS criteria JSON NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS reward VARCHAR(500) NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS deadline TIMESTAMP NULL;
